description: Retrieve file or file system status

checksum_algorithm.description: Algorithm to determine checksum of file. Will throw an error if the host is unable to use specified algorithm.

get_checksum.description: Whether to return a checksum of the file (default sha1).

path.description: The full path of the file/object to get the facts of.

get_md5.description: Whether to return the md5 sum of the file. Will return None if not a regular file or if we're unable to use md5 (Common for FIPS-140 compliant systems).

get_mime.description: Use file magic and return data about the nature of the file. this uses the 'file' utility found on most Linux/Unix systems. This will add both `mime_type` and 'charset' fields to the return, if possible. In 2.3 this option changed from 'mime' to 'get_mime' and the default changed to 'Yes'.

get_attributes.description: Get file attributes using lsattr tool if present.
